meanings.definition: A building divided into four separate living units.
meanings.sent1: The quadplex down the street has four apartments.
meanings.sent2: We visited a quadplex with four different families living in it.
meanings.sent3: The quadplex was so crowded with four families, it felt like a mini village!
meanings.sent4: The quadplex stood tall, each unit like a separate kingdom in a castle.
meanings.sent5: The quadplex was like a puzzle with four pieces, each fitting perfectly together.

meanings.definition: A set of four similar things or parts.
meanings.sent1: She bought a quadplex of cupcakes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The quadplex of chairs matched perfectly around the table.
meanings.sent3: The quadplex of flowers in the garden bloomed in unison.
meanings.sent4: His quadplex of tools made him feel like a master craftsman.
meanings.sent5: The quadplex of books on the shelf created a colorful display.
